alert.note: Alert for Upper Jefferson; Western Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 12:29AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Orleans and northwestern Jefferson Parishes through 100 AM CDT... At 1229 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Metairie, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Orleans, Metairie, Harvey, Timberlane, Marrero, Avondale, Jefferson, Gretna, Harahan, Westwego, Elmwood, Terrytown, Bridge City, River Ridge, Waggaman, Arabi, Ama, St. Rose, New Orleans Armstrong Airport and Lakefront Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 222 and 243. Interstate 610 between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southeastern Louisiana.
